txt.en: 'Sithric has his eye on us already. He grows suspicious whenever anyone he deems dangerous to his cause leaves his sight for long.'

'Sithric does not seem happy with my newfound zeal, eh? No matter; I endeavour to do all that you did and more to get Stangard back on its feet, [placeholder].\n\n'Sithric can go rot for all I care. You are welcome in Stangard any time, but I will venture to say that your work here is done!'
Instance: Stanric's Stand

'My men have been coming to thank me for various good deeds you have done for them, traveller.\n\n'Please, tell me how you were able to do so much for us, for I wish to continue this trend after you leave.'
'Come with me, [placeholder]. It is high time for change.'
Gadda points you to Stanric's house for a discussion away from unfriendly eyes and ears
'Come, let us retire for now. Talking and thinking are more exhausting than a day's labour, when such heavy topics are underway.'
You tell Stanric about the good you were able to do with little effort, free of the restrictions of politics
Stanric seems determined to make a change
Gadda is outside of the Mead Hall at Stangard.
Sithric is enraged at Stanric's new defiance, but Stanric is determined to be strong
Stanric is inside of his house in Stangard, near the Mead Hall.
Stanric is in his household near the Mead Hall.
Talk to Stanric.
Stanric has gone outside.\n\nYou should follow him.
Gadda is outside of Stanric's house.
Gadda, Stanric, and Sithric are outside of the Mead Hall.
Talk to Stanric.
Talk to Gadda
Talk to Stanric inside his house
Tell Stanric of your methods and hear his thoughts
Talk to Stanric
Follow Stanric outside
Talk to Gadda
Observe the confrontation between Sithric and Stanric
Talk to Stanric
Sithric has at last caught wind of your deeds on behalf of Stangard, and for some reason he is displeased....
'Stanric wishes to speak with you in private, [placeholder]. He is inside of his house now.\n\n'Go on, there is little time. Unfriendly eyes are all around us.'
